examples.title: Basic Document Processing
examples.description: Process a single PDF document with automatic backend selection
examples.expected_output: Text content extracted from contract.pdf with confidence score and processing details

examples.title: Scanner Discovery
examples.user_input: What scanners do I have connected?
examples.expected_output: List of available scanner devices with IDs and capabilities

examples.title: Document Scanning
examples.description: Scan a document using connected scanner
examples.user_input: Scan a document and save it as scanned_doc.png
examples.expected_output: Document scanned and saved to specified path

examples.title: Batch Document Processing
examples.user_input: Process these three documents: invoice.pdf, letter.pdf, form.jpg
examples.expected_output: All documents processed concurrently and saved in markdown format

examples.title: Region Text Extraction
examples.description: Extract text from specific region of an image
examples.user_input: Extract text from the address field in this form image
examples.expected_output: Text extracted from specified region with coordinates

examples.title: Backend Status Check
examples.user_input: Which OCR backends are currently working?
examples.expected_output: Status of all OCR backends (available/unavailable) with version info

examples.title: High-Resolution Scanning
examples.description: Scan document at high resolution for archival quality
examples.user_input: Scan this important document at 600 DPI for archiving
examples.expected_output: High-resolution scan saved for archival purposes

examples.title: Research Paper Processing
examples.description: Process academic paper with optimal backend
examples.user_input: Process this research paper with the best available OCR
examples.expected_output: Research paper processed using DeepSeek-OCR with markdown output

examples.title: Form Data Extraction
examples.description: Extract structured data from filled forms
examples.user_input: Extract the name and address from this filled form
examples.expected_output: Structured JSON output with extracted form fields

examples.title: Bulk Archive Processing
examples.user_input: Process all PDFs in my documents folder and save as text files
examples.expected_output: All PDFs in documents folder processed and saved as text files

examples.title: Academic Paper Processing
examples.description: Process research paper with optimal backend selection
examples.user_input: Extract text from this research paper with mathematical equations
examples.expected_output: Research paper processed using DeepSeek-OCR with proper equation formatting in markdown

examples.title: Invoice Processing
examples.user_input: Process this invoice and extract the total amount and date
examples.expected_output: Invoice processed with structured JSON output including amount, date, vendor info

examples.title: Handwritten Note Processing
examples.description: Process handwritten document with advanced OCR
examples.user_input: Read this handwritten note from my meeting
examples.expected_output: Handwritten notes transcribed using Mistral OCR 3 with high accuracy

examples.title: Multi-language Document
examples.user_input: Extract text from this bilingual document
examples.expected_output: Multilingual document processed with proper language detection and formatting

examples.title: Form Field Extraction
examples.description: Extract specific fields from a form
examples.user_input: Extract the name and address from this application form
examples.expected_output: Specific form fields extracted with high precision using Florence-2

examples.title: High-Volume Document Processing
examples.description: Process large batch of similar documents
examples.user_input: Process these 50 receipts for expense reporting
examples.expected_output: 50 receipts processed concurrently using PP-OCRv5 with JSON output for expense system

examples.title: Scanned Book Processing
examples.description: Process scanned book with multiple pages
examples.user_input: Convert this scanned book to searchable text
examples.expected_output: Multi-page scanned book processed with HTML output preserving formatting

examples.title: Legal Document Processing
examples.description: Process legal document with high accuracy
examples.user_input: Extract text from this legal contract carefully
examples.expected_output: Legal contract processed with Mistral OCR 3 ensuring high accuracy for legal requirements

examples.title: Real-time Scanner Usage
examples.description: Use scanner for immediate document processing
examples.user_input: Scan this document and extract the text immediately
examples.expected_output: Document scanned at high resolution, then automatically processed for text extraction

configuration_examples.title: Set Default Backend
configuration_examples.user_input: Use Florence-2 as my default OCR backend

configuration_examples.title: Configure API Key
configuration_examples.description: Set API key for cloud OCR services
configuration_examples.user_input: Set my Mistral OCR API key

configuration_examples.title: Configure Batch Processing
configuration_examples.user_input: Allow up to 8 concurrent document processing operations

configuration_examples.title: Set GPU Acceleration
configuration_examples.description: Enable GPU processing for compatible backends
configuration_examples.user_input: Enable GPU acceleration for OCR processing

configuration_examples.title: Configure Scan Resolution
configuration_examples.user_input: Set default scan resolution to 600 DPI

configuration_examples.title: Configure Memory Limits
configuration_examples.description: Set maximum memory usage per operation
configuration_examples.user_input: Limit OCR operations to 4GB of memory

error_handling_examples.title: Backend Unavailable
error_handling_examples.description: Handle when preferred backend is not available
error_handling_examples.recovery: Automatically falls back to next available backend (Florence-2)

error_handling_examples.title: Scanner Not Connected
error_handling_examples.recovery: Verify scanner is powered on and connected

error_handling_examples.title: Unsupported File Format
error_handling_examples.recovery: Convert file to supported format (PDF, PNG, JPG, TIFF, BMP)

error_handling_examples.title: API Key Missing
error_handling_examples.description: Handle missing API key for cloud backends
error_handling_examples.error: Mistral OCR API key not configured
error_handling_examples.recovery: Fall back to local backends (DeepSeek, Florence, PP-OCR)
error_handling_examples.user_action: Configure API key in Claude Desktop settings or use local backends

error_handling_examples.title: Network Connection Failed
error_handling_examples.description: Handle network connectivity issues for cloud backends
error_handling_examples.error: Network connection timeout - cannot reach Mistral API
error_handling_examples.recovery: Retry with exponential backoff, switch to local backends
error_handling_examples.user_action: Check internet connection, retry later, or use offline backends

error_handling_examples.title: Memory Insufficient
error_handling_examples.description: Handle out of memory errors for large documents
error_handling_examples.error: Insufficient memory for processing large document (2.5GB file)
error_handling_examples.recovery: Process document in chunks or reduce resolution
error_handling_examples.user_action: Split large documents or reduce scan resolution

error_handling_examples.title: GPU Not Available
error_handling_examples.description: Handle missing GPU for GPU-accelerated backends
error_handling_examples.error: CUDA GPU not available for DeepSeek-OCR processing
error_handling_examples.recovery: Fall back to CPU processing (slower but functional)
error_handling_examples.user_action: Install CUDA drivers or use CPU-only backends like PP-OCR

error_handling_examples.title: File Corruption
error_handling_examples.description: Handle corrupted or invalid document files
error_handling_examples.error: File appears corrupted or invalid format
error_handling_examples.recovery: Validate file integrity, suggest file repair
error_handling_examples.user_action: Verify file is not corrupted, try different file format

error_handling_examples.title: Scanner Driver Issues
error_handling_examples.error: Scanner driver incompatible or not installed
error_handling_examples.recovery: Use alternative scanner or software scanning
error_handling_examples.user_action: Install correct scanner drivers or use different scanning method

error_handling_examples.title: Concurrent Limit Exceeded
error_handling_examples.recovery: Queue additional operations for later processing
error_handling_examples.user_action: Wait for current operations to complete or reduce batch size

error_handling_examples.title: Backend Model Loading Failed
error_handling_examples.error: Cannot load Florence-2 model - insufficient disk space
error_handling_examples.recovery: Free up disk space or use alternative backend
error_handling_examples.user_action: Clear disk space (need ~2GB free) or select different backend

error_handling_examples.title: Rate Limit Exceeded
error_handling_examples.description: Handle API rate limiting for cloud backends
error_handling_examples.error: Mistral API rate limit exceeded (100 requests/minute)
error_handling_examples.recovery: Implement request throttling, switch to local backends
error_handling_examples.user_action: Wait for rate limit reset or use local processing
